CT ABDOMEN.liver: Enhances homogeneously without focal lesions or intrahepatic biliary duct dilatation.
CT ABDOMEN.kidneys: Show symmetric nephrograms and excretion of contrast. No focal renal lesion or hydronephrosis bilaterally.
CT ABDOMEN.bowel: Small and large bowel within normal limits, without evidence of wall thickening or dilatation to suggest obstruction.

appendix.condition: Appears inflamed with significant mucosal enhancement.
appendix.caliber: Increased at its base measuring 10 mm.
appendix.surrounding: Some stranding surrounding the base of the cecum and appendix as well as a small amount of supra-apendicular fluid.

CT ABDOMEN.lymph_nodes: No mesenteric or retroperitoneal lymph node enlargement by CT size criteria.

findings.osseoous_structures: No lytic or blastic lesions concerning for malignancy.
